description: Agent Planning Validation Benchmark for Lesson 14 - 100 tasks testing plan correctness, tool selection, and goal alignment

available_tools.name: get_user_preferences
available_tools.description: Retrieve user dietary preferences and restrictions

available_tools.name: get_recipe_details
available_tools.description: Get full recipe information by ID

available_tools.description: Check if ingredient is in stock

available_tools.description: Search external web for general information

available_tools.name: get_gita_verses
available_tools.description: Search Bhagavad Gita verses by chapter/verse/keyword

available_tools.name: add_to_shopping_list
available_tools.description: Add ingredients to user's shopping list
